location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire, to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledges and accepts orders from the Government of Bombay to discontinue the purchasing of Persian carpets. William Bruce informs James Farish that two bales of Persian carpets have already been consigned to Bombay on board the Eliza.
